RelatedSentence: - Shiloh Primitive Baptist Church , 385 FM 20 , will be hosting a musical celebration .
This year 's event , which will be free to attend , will offer a bigger line up of live action pports , skateboarding , BMX , pit bike racing and food by Southside BBQ .
DJ Zane is set to emcee the event .
